title: Astonish Brotherhood Recruiting Serious Players D5 +

embed.description: Astonish Brotherhood. 67 likes · 1 talking about this. Original Oceanic Gaming Team: Founded by Drawzy aka Drawzable Astonish is built on three things:...

body:
Astonish is a new clan / team of OCE players of different games. We are looking for a team of LOL players who are ready to take on the competitive side of gaming. If you are keen to join Astonish please comment your IGN down below and your role you wish to play or contact us at https://www.facebook.com/AstonishBrotherhood/timeline .

Requirements-
- At least diamond 5 +
- Must be confident in the role that they choose.
- Has to be committed to at least 3 practices a week.

Post Below

IGN-
Previous Competitive Experience-
Goals-
Rank-
Role-


Also subscribe to our Youtube channel http://youtube.com/c/AstonishBrotherhood
